attributes.action: Working On Christmas and New Year Bank Holidays
attributes.additional_details: This petition is to ban all shops from  opening on Christmas Day, Boxing Day and New Years Day and any days given in lieu when Christmas and New Year holidays fall at the weekend. People should be able to spend these holidays with their friends and families and celebrate the festive activities. They should not be forced to work. There is no need for any shop to open on these bank holidays.
